title: Dar-e Dask
text: Dar-e Dask (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Dar-e Desk and Dardesk; also known as Dar Dar, Dardez, and Dar-e Dashk) is a village in <a href="Saghder%20Rural%20District">Saghder Rural District</a>, <a href="Jebalbarez%20District">Jebalbarez District</a>, <a href="Jiroft%20County">Jiroft County</a>, <a href="Kerman%20Province">Kerman Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 460, in 69 families.
